title: EO 14067 Research Pack — Ensuring Responsible Development of Digital Assets
summary: A verified, source-linked research bundle on Executive Order 14067. Includes a long abstract (neutral), an impact assessment with mechanisms and scenarios, a red-team debunk report, compact records.jsonl, and a minimal lattice claim file, plus a checksum log. Built for quick verification and reuse by journalists, analysts, policy teams, and creators. Primary sources: Federal Register entry and GovInfo PDF. Set to pay-what-you-want.
changelog: v01 — Initial public release: records.jsonl, lattice_min.json, watch_center.log.json, abstract_long.md, impact_assessment.md, public_summary.md, debunk_report.md (all inside EO14067_bundle_v01.zip).
